title: Light, Fast & Responsive
text: We make sure that the product is developed meeting the market standards. We upgrade ourselves frequently

section.title: Why Invent?
section.content: Invent offers services from Ideation to Release product. We will also help you set up your in house engineering team.

section.title: At what cost?
section.content: We work at the minimal operating cost and develop an efficient and affordable server architecture, while taking care of your budget.
